TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Semaphore extends System.Threading.WaitHandle
Public NotInheritable Class Semaphore Inherits WaitHandle
public ref class Semaphore sealed : System::Threading::WaitHandle

summary.span: 限制可以同時存取資源或資源集區的執行緒數目。

span.span: Limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來控制存取權的資源集區。Use the class to control access to a pool of resources. 執行緒藉由呼叫進入號誌方法，它繼承自類別，並藉由呼叫釋放號誌方法。Threads enter the semaphore by calling the method, which is inherited from the class, and release the semaphore by calling the method. 號誌計數會每次在執行緒進入號誌，及執行緒釋放號誌時，遞增遞減。The count on a semaphore is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented when a thread releases the semaphore. 當計數為零時，後續的要求封鎖，直到其他執行緒釋放號誌。When the count is zero, subsequent requests block until other threads release the semaphore. 所有執行緒都釋放號誌，計數會達到最大值時指定已建立的號誌。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 沒有任何保證的順序，例如 FIFO 或 LIFO，在其中已封鎖的執行緒進入號誌。There is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, in which blocked threads enter the semaphore. 執行緒可以進入號誌多次，藉由呼叫方法重複。A thread can enter the semaphore multiple times, by calling the method repeatedly. 若要釋放的部分或所有項目，執行緒可以呼叫無參數多次，或它可以呼叫的方法多載方法多載會指定釋出的項目數。To release some or all of these entries, the thread can call the parameterless method overload multiple times, or it can call the method overload that specifies the number of entries to be released. 類別不會強制呼叫的執行緒身分識別或。The class does not enforce thread identity on calls to or . 它是程式設計人員必須負責確保，執行緒沒有釋放號誌太多次。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that threads do not release the semaphore too many times. 例如，假設某個號誌的最大計數為 2，且執行緒 A 和執行緒 B 都進入號誌。For example, suppose a semaphore has a maximum count of two, and that thread A and thread B both enter the semaphore. 如果執行緒 B 中的程式設計錯誤導致呼叫兩次，這兩個呼叫會成功。If a programming error in thread B causes it to call twice, both calls succeed. 此時號誌計數已滿，當執行緒 A 終於呼叫 時，就會擲回 。The count on the semaphore is full, and when thread A eventually calls , a is thrown. 號誌有兩種類型： 本機號誌和具名的系統號誌。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 如果您建立物件使用的建構函式可接受名稱，它是與該名稱的作業系統號誌相關聯。If you create a object using a constructor that accepts a name, it is associated with an operating-system semaphore of that name. 具名的系統號誌會顯示整個作業系統，而且可用來同步處理程序的活動。Named system semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, and can be used to synchronize the activities of processes. 您可以建立多個代表相同的物件命名系統號誌，而且您可以使用方法來開啟現有的具名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore, and you can use the method to open an existing named system semaphore. 本機號誌只會存在於您的程序。A local semaphore exists only within your process. 在處理序內，只要是參考了本機 物件的執行緒，就可使用本機 Mutex。It can be used by any thread in your process that has a reference to the local object. 每個物件是否不同本機號誌。Each object is a separate local semaphore. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立號誌的三個最大計數與初始的計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖等候號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒使用方法多載來增加為最大值，允許三個執行緒進入號誌的號誌計數。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒會使用方法等候 1 秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加，每個執行緒，以讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以及指定並行項目的最大數目及選擇性地保留某些項目。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化未命名的號誌。This constructor initializes an unnamed semaphore. 使用這類的號誌的執行個體的所有執行緒都必須都有執行個體的參考。All threads that use an instance of such a semaphore must have references to the instance. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，效果等同視為目前的執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您不想保留任何項目之執行緒的建立號誌，使用的相同號碼`maximumCount`和`initialCount`。If you do not want to reserve any entries for the thread that creates the semaphore, use the same number for `maximumCount` and `initialCount`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個號誌的三個最大計數與初始的計數為零。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖等候號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒使用方法多載來增加為最大值，允許三個執行緒進入號誌的號誌計數。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒會使用方法等候 1 秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加，每個執行緒，以讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目數目與並行項目的最大數目，以及選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, and optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化代表具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個代表相同的物件命名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果不存在的具名的系統號誌，則會建立初始的計數與所指定的計數上限`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果具名的系統號誌已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用，雖然無效的值仍會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 若要判斷是否已命名的系統號誌已建立，使用改為建構函式多載。If you need to determine whether or not a named system semaphore was created, use the constructor overload instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用這個建構函式多載時，建議的作法是指定的相同號碼`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。When you use this constructor overload, the recommended practice is to specify the same number for `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，並建立具名的系統號誌，效果等同視為目前的執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and a named system semaphore is created, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 不過，使用這個建構函式多載沒有任何方法來判斷是否已建立具名的系統號誌。However, with this constructor overload there is no way to determine whether a named system semaphore was created. 如果您指定`null`或空字串`name`，建立本機號誌，視為已呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 因為整個作業系統，您看不見具名號誌，它們可用來協調跨處理序界限的資源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. 如果您想要了解具名的系統號誌是否存在，請使用方法。If you want to find out whether a named system semaphore exists, use the method. 方法嘗試開啟現有的具名號誌，並擲回例外狀況，如果系統號誌不存在。The method attempts to open an existing named semaphore, and throws an exception if the system semaphore does not exist. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 此範例會建立具名號誌，其最大計數為 5 與初始的計數為 5。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of five. 讓程式在三次呼叫方法。The program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果您是從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會封鎖第三個呼叫。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 發行的第一個程式，以解除封鎖第二個副本中的一或多個項目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目物件數目與並行項目的最大數目，選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱，以及指定接收值的變數，指出是否已建立新的系統號誌。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, and specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化代表具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個代表相同的物件命名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果不存在的具名的系統號誌，則會建立初始的計數與所指定的計數上限`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果具名的系統號誌已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用，雖然無效的值仍會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`來判斷是否已建立的系統號誌。Use `createdNew` to determine whether the system semaphore was created. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，並`createdNew`是`true`，效果等同視為目前的執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您指定`null`或空字串`name`，建立本機號誌，視為已呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在此情況下，`createdNew`總是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因為整個作業系統，您看不見具名號誌，它們可用來協調跨處理序界限的資源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 此範例會建立具名號誌，使用其最大計數為 5，且兩個初始計數。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of two. 也就是說，它會保留之執行緒的呼叫建構函式的三個項目。That is, it reserves three entries for the thread that calls the constructor. 如果`createNew`已`false`，讓程式在三次呼叫方法。If `createNew` is `false`, the program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果您是從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會封鎖第三個呼叫。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 發行的第一個程式，以解除封鎖第二個副本中的一或多個項目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目數目與並行項目的最大數目，選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱，指定接收值的變數 (以指示是否已建立新的系統號誌)，以及指定系統號誌的安全性存取控制。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created, and specifying security access control for the system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式套用至具名的系統號誌的存取控制安全性，當它建立時，防止其他程式碼的號誌的控制。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system semaphore when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the semaphore. 這個建構函式初始化代表具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個代表相同的物件命名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果具名的系統號誌不存在，它會建立具有指定的存取控制安全性。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果具名的信號已存在，則會忽略指定的存取控制安全性。If the named semaphore exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端具有全權掌控新建物件，即使`semaphoreSecurity`拒絕，或無法授與給目前的使用者部分存取權限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `semaphoreSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 不過，如果目前的使用者嘗試取得另一個物件代表相同具名號誌，使用建構函式或方法，套用存取控制安全性的 Windows。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named semaphore, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果不存在的具名的系統號誌，則會建立初始的計數與所指定的計數上限`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果具名的系統號誌已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`未使用，雖然無效的值仍會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`參數，來判斷是否由這個建構函式所建立的系統號誌。Use the `createdNew` parameter to determine whether the system semaphore was created by this constructor. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，並`createdNew`是`true`，效果等同視為目前的執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您指定`null`或空字串`name`，建立本機號誌，視為已呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在此情況下，`createdNew`總是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因為整個作業系統，您看不見具名號誌，它們可用來協調跨處理序界限的資源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用號誌的權限，但是會授與讀取和變更號誌的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，輸入，並釋放所需的權限開啟號誌。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，它會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

具名信號已存在，並且具有存取控制安全性，而使用者沒有 。

exception.span: 無法建立具名信號，可能是因為不同類型的等候控制代碼具有相同的名稱。

span.span: The named semaphore cannot be created, perhaps because a wait handle of a different type has the same name.

span.span: for calling unmanaged code to create a named system semaphore.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity GetAccessControl ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity GetAccessControl() cil managed
Public Function GetAccessControl () As SemaphoreSecurity
public: System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreSecurity ^ GetAccessControl();
member this.GetAccessControl : unit -> System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity

summary.span: 為具名系統號誌取得存取控制安全性。

span.span: Gets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

returns.span: 物件，表示具名系統號誌的存取控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security for the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用下列旗標 （使用位元 OR 運算結合） 的組合來搜尋權限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和號誌的權限必須是與開啟權限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. 在本機的號誌，存取控制安全性是不相關。On a local semaphore, access control security is irrelevant. 如果物件不代表具名的系統號誌，則這個方法會傳回授與給任何使用者的所有權限的物件。If the object does not represent a named system semaphore, this method returns a object that grants all rights to any user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用的號誌的權限，但是會授與讀取和變更號誌的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 使用取得的系統號誌的存取控制安全性方法。The access control security for the system semaphore is obtained using the method. 權限變更之後，輸入，並釋放所需的權限開啟號誌。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，它會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens a specified named semaphore, if it already exists.

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists.

returns.span: 表示具名系統號誌的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試開啟指定的具名號誌。The method tries to open the specified named semaphore. 如果系統號誌不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立的系統號誌。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要建立的系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件都代表相同命名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒進入號誌，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個最大計數與和拒絕的目前使用者使用的號誌的權限，但這會授與讀取和變更號誌的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but which grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫方法多載。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method overload. 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，輸入，並釋放它所需的權限開啟號誌。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，它會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用所需的安全性存取權，開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, with the desired security access.

returns.span: 表示具名系統號誌的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`參數必須包含旗標，好讓執行緒進入號誌，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 方法嘗試開啟現有的具名號誌。The method tries to open an existing named semaphore. 如果系統號誌不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立的系統號誌。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要建立的系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件都代表相同命名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用的號誌的權限，但是會授與讀取和變更號誌的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限變更之後，輸入，並釋放它所需的權限開啟號誌。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，它會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 結束號誌，並傳回上一個計數。

span.span: Exits the semaphore and returns the previous count.

returns.span: 呼叫 方法之前，號誌上的計數。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒通常會使用通常輸入信號，而且它們的方法會使用這個方法多載來結束。Threads typically use the method to enter the semaphore, and they typically use this method overload to exit. 如果就會擲回方法，它不一定表示呼叫執行緒的問題。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一個執行緒中的程式設計錯誤可能會造成該執行緒結束號誌，更多的時間超出其輸入。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果目前物件表示具名的系統號誌，則使用者必須擁有權限和號誌必須已經開啟與權限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立號誌的三個最大計數與初始的計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖等候號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒使用方法多載來增加為最大值，允許三個執行緒進入號誌的號誌計數。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒會使用方法等候 1 秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加，每個執行緒，以讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Release (int releaseCount);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 Release(int32 releaseCount) cil managed
Public Function Release (releaseCount As Integer) As Integer
public: int Release(int releaseCount);
member this.Release : int -> int

param.name: releaseCount
param.span: 結束號誌的次數。

span.span: The number of times to exit the semaphore.

summary.span: 以指定的次數結束號誌，並回到上一個計數。

span.span: Exits the semaphore a specified number of times and returns the previous count.

returns.span: 呼叫 方法之前，號誌上的計數。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果執行緒已多次進入號誌，則這個方法多載可讓與某個呼叫還原整個的號誌計數。If a thread has entered the semaphore multiple times, this method overload allows the entire semaphore count to be restored with one call. 如果就會擲回方法，它不一定表示呼叫執行緒的問題。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一個執行緒中的程式設計錯誤可能會造成該執行緒結束號誌，更多的時間超出其輸入。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果目前物件表示具名的系統號誌，則使用者必須擁有權限和號誌必須已經開啟與權限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立號誌的三個最大計數與初始的計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖等候號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒使用方法多載來增加為最大值，允許三個執行緒進入號誌的號誌計數。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒會使用方法等候 1 秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加，每個執行緒，以讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The semaphore count is already at the maximum value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessControl (System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessControl(class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity) cil managed
public: void SetAccessControl(System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreSecurity ^ semaphoreSecurity);
member this.SetAccessControl : System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity -> unit

param.name: semaphoreSecurity
param.span: 物件，表示要套用到具名系統旗號的存取控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security to be applied to the named system semaphore.

summary.span: 為具名系統號誌設定存取控制安全性。

span.span: Sets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以只上設定存取控制安全性代表具名的系統號誌的物件。You can set access control security only on objects that represent named system semaphores. 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和號誌的權限必須是與開啟權限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為具有存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用號誌的權限，但是會授與讀取和變更號誌的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗中執行編譯的範例，第二個複本將會擲回存取違規例外狀況呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 攔截到例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限，使用後來輸入，並釋放所需的權限開啟號誌的方法。After the permissions are changed, using the method, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您從第三個 [命令] 視窗中執行編譯的範例，它會執行使用新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The user does not have rights.

span.span: Opens a specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryOpenExisting (string name, out System.Threading.Semaphore result);

Public Shared Function TryOpenExisting (name As String, ByRef result As Semaphore) As Boolean

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

param.name: result
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，如果呼叫成功，則包含 物件，此物件代表具名信號，如果呼叫失敗，則為。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named semaphore if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)，並傳回值，指出作業是否成功。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果已成功開啟具名號誌，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名號誌不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定是否存在的具名號誌，使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，則會擲回例外狀況，如果號誌不存在。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒進入號誌，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method.

exception.span: 的長度超過 260 個字元。
具名的信號已存在，但使用者沒有使用它所需的安全性存取權。

span.span: The named semaphore exists, but the user does not have the security access required to use it.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryOpenExisting (string name, System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights rights, out System.Threading.Semaphore result);

param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，表示所需的安全性存取。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that represent the desired security access.

param.span: 這個方法傳回時，如果呼叫成功，則包含 物件，此物件代表具名信號，如果呼叫失敗，則為。

returns.span: 如果已成功開啟具名號誌，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名號誌不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定是否存在的具名號誌，使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，則會擲回例外狀況，如果號誌不存在。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. `rights`參數必須包含旗標，好讓執行緒進入號誌，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件都代表相同命名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore.

exception.span: 的長度超過 260 個字元。
具名的信號已存在，但使用者沒有使用它所需的安全性存取權。
